Module mesakit.graph.core
Package com.telenav.mesakit.graph.specifications.library.pbf

Class IntersectionMap

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.mesakit.graph.specifications.library.pbf.IntersectionMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named
public class IntersectionMap extends Object implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named
Determines which nodes are intersections by counting the number of times that WayNodes are referenced by ways. If a node is referenced more than two times (one reference to a node shared by two connected ways is not an intersection), then it is an intersection involving three or more ways. Way node references are indicated by calling addReference(long nodeIdentifier) for each way node in each way. Once processing of ways has completed, a call to doneAdding() frees the memory used by the (very large) intersection counting data structures after copying the intersection node identifiers into a much more memory-efficient SplitLongSet.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
